trends: There have been 14 other sightings in Fullerton
There were no other sightings in Fullerton on or around July 22nd 2012
divs: sighting detailsi was in my bedroom when i noticed a odd and fuzzy looking object in the sky (south of my location in fullerton) close to fullerton airport. i am an aerospace engineer and at first i assumed it was a helicopter hovering over the airport. however the flashing red lights on top and bottom of the vehicle and the shape of the object were odd. i grabbed my 10x50 binoculars and looked at the object. i could not believe what i saw...two triangular domes on top and bottom connected by a cylinder. it was greyish\silver color and was hovering and very slowly moving west. i watched it for ~20-30 minutes i took a picture but it was too far for my lens (75mm). did not have enough time to set up my telescope and take a better pic.
Summary: two spining domes connect by cylinder
